text: Yrjö Aaltonen (31 January 1916 – 19 April 1979)Yrjö Aaltonen - Biography was a Finnish director of photography and actor. He was born in Rauma. ==Filmography== *Miriam 1957 Actor *Nuoruus Vauhdissa 1961 Director Of Photography *Gabriel, Tule Takaisin 1951 Director Of Photography *Pikku Pietarin Piha 1961 Director Of Photography *Sinut Mina Tahdon 1949 Director Of Photography.YRJO AALTONEN: Film Database - CITWF ==References== Category:1916 births Category:1979 deaths Category:People from Rauma, Finland Category:People from Turku and Pori Province (Grand Duchy of Finland) Category:Finnish male film actors Category:20th-century Finnish photographers Category:20th-century Finnish male actors
title: Yrjö Aaltonen
